board.name: htg_zrf16
board.description: HiTech Global ZYNQ UltraScale+ RFSoC Development Platform with ZU29DR

component.name: part0
component.description: FPGA component on the HTG-ZRF16 board

component.name: ddr4_sodimm_pl
component.description: DDR4 SODIMM Memory on PL side, 72-bit ECC, up to 16GB

component.name: fmc_hpc_connector
component.description: VITA57.4 compliant FMC+ High Pin Count connector

component.name: sys_clock
component.description: System Clock from Si5341 programmable clock generator

component.name: user_pb_pl
component.description: 1 User Push Button connected to PL

component.name: user_dip_sw_pl
component.description: 4 User DIP Switches connected to PL

component.name: uart_pl
component.description: UART to USB through CP2103 Bridge (PL)

component.name: i2c_pl
component.description: I2C Bus from PL for programmable clocks and other devices

component.name: pps_interface
component.description: 1-PPS (Pulse Per Second) interface for timing synchronization

component.name: user_io_pl
component.description: 8 User IO pins connected to PL

component.name: sdio
component.description: Secure Digital IO port for SD card interface
